text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Castilla–La Mancha | official_name = | native_name = | other_name = Castile–La Mancha | settlement_type = Autonomous community | image_alt = Flag of Castilla–La Mancha | image_caption = | image_flag = Bandera Castilla-La Mancha.svg | flag_size = 125px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Escudo de Castilla-La Mancha.svg | shield_size = 100x100px | shield_alt = Coat-of-arms of Castilla–La Mancha | nickname = | motto = | anthem = | image_map = Castilla-La Mancha in Spain (plus Canarias).svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Castile-La Mancha within Spain | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Spain | subdivision_type1 = Capital | subdivision_type2 = Largest city | subdivision_name1 = Toledo (de facto) | subdivision_name2 = Albacete }} Castilla–La Mancha or Castile-La Mancha is an autonomous community in Spain with a population over 2,000,000. The capital is Toledo and the biggest cities are Albacete, Talavera of the Queen, Guadalajara, Ciudad Real, Puertollano, and Cuenca. Provinces of Castile-La Mancha: * Albacete province * Cuenca province * Guadalajara province * Ciudad Real province * Toledo province ==Gallery==
title: Castilla–La Mancha
